intro: Siphonostelma stenophyllum, commonly known as the narrow-leaf stelmatum, is a member of the Rhamnaceae family. It is a small, evergreen shrub native to tropical regions of Africa. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are often narrow and lance-shaped. It produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a small, spherical drupe that contains a single seed.
